tool_description: A simple API to get, add, and update quotes.
name: Quote
title: Quote

api_list.name: List Quotes (1)
api_list.description: List all quotes in the database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quote12.p.rapidapi.com/quotes/list"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quote12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Specific number of quotes
api_list.description: Get a Specific amount of quotes

headers = {

        }

api_list.name: Update a Quote
api_list.description: Specify the quote you would like to update, and give a new author and quote to update it with.

required_parameters.name: quote
required_parameters.default: I hope you like my api :D

api_list.name: Get Single Quote
api_list.description: Get a single random quote from the database.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://quote12.p.rapidapi.com/quotes"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "quote12.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
